original_title: Alien from Area 51: The Alien Autopsy Footage Revealed
overview: In this documentary Ray Santilli and Gary Shoefield explain how their lives have changed since they made footage of an alien autopsy available to the public in a 1995 television special. They also explain how governments around the world are keeping the truth hidden from us.
title: Alien from Area 51: The Alien Autopsy Footage Revealed
